original_title: UAE’s Soho Hospitality to run Above Eleven restaurant at Sri Lanka’s Galadari Hotel
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s Galadari Hotel has entered into an agreement with Dubai UAE restaurant operator Soho Hospitality Corporate Service Provider – FZCO to manage its Above Eleven restaurant, the company said.
Soho Hospitality Corporate Service Provider – FZCO will develop, manage and operate the Above Eleven restaurant at Galadari Hotel, Colombo 1, Galadari said in a stock exchange filing.
The restaurant is expected to open in the latter part of 2025. (Colombo/Nov21/2024)
